abstract: What’s the early read on Amazon.com‘s deal to buy Audible? Like many things related to Amazon these days, it’s all relative.
lead_paragraph: What’s the early read on Amazon.com‘s deal to buy Audible? Like many things related to Amazon these days, it’s all relative.

headline.main: Did Audible Save the Day for Amazon?

abstract: Amazon could experiment in fascinating ways with its new acquisition, Audible.com. What if you could switch back and forth between an electronic book and the audio version?
snippet: Amazon could experiment in fascinating ways with its new acquisition, Audible.com. What if you could switch back and forth between an electronic book and the audio version?
lead_paragraph: Steve Jobs said earlier this month that Amazon’s Kindle e-book reader was dead on arrival, since Americans have largely abandoned reading.

headline.main: Could Amazon and Audible Rewrite the Rules of Publishing?
